body:
<!-- **Are you in the right place?**
1. For issues or feature requests, please create an issue in this repository.
2. For general technical and non-technical questions, we are happy to help you on our [Rook.io Slack](https://slack.rook.io/).
3. Did you already search the existing open issues for anything similar? -->

**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**
Integration tests are failing to delete pools periodically due to the new finalizer recently added.

In [this build](https://jenkins.rook.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/rook%2Frook/detail/PR-4971/3/pipeline) there are two different types of failures seen.

1. On K8s 1.13, the [flex suite](https://jenkins.rook.io/blue/rest/organizations/jenkins/pipelines/rook/pipelines/rook/branches/PR-4971/runs/3/nodes/52/steps/118/log/?start=0) fails with the `block-pool-rwo` pool still existing. The [operator log](https://jenkins.rook.io/job/rook/job/rook/job/PR-4971/3/artifact/_output/tests/TestCephFlexSuitepoolcheck_aws_1.14.x_flex-ns-system_rook-ceph-operator-c454cb697-wrncf_1583450813.log) shows the following failures and is not able to ever delete the pool after retrying with the same failure every 2s.
```
2020-03-05 23:26:39.211057 E | ceph-block-pool-controller: failed to reconcile failed to delete pool "block-pool-rwo". : failed to delete pool "block-pool-rwo": failed to check if pool "block-pool-rwo" has rbd images: pool "block-pool-rwo" contains images/snapshosts
```

2. On K8s 1.14, the [smoke suite](https://jenkins.rook.io/blue/rest/organizations/jenkins/pipelines/rook/pipelines/rook/branches/PR-4971/runs/3/nodes/51/steps/120/log/?start=0) fails with the `replicapoolretained` pool still existing. The [operator log](https://jenkins.rook.io/job/rook/job/rook/job/PR-4971/3/artifact/_output/tests/TestCephSmokeSuitepoolcheck_aws_1.13.x_smoke-ns-system_rook-ceph-operator-7959bc8754-27zdq_1583451848.log) shows the following failures and is not able to ever delete the pool after retrying with the same failure every 2s, but the error is different from the other test:
```
2020-03-05 23:39:35.325866 I | ceph-spec: removing finalizer "cephblockpool.ceph.rook.io" on "replicapoolretained"
2020-03-05 23:39:35.328604 E | ceph-block-pool-controller: failed to reconcile failed to remove finalizer: failed to remove finalizer "cephblockpool.ceph.rook.io" on "replicapoolretained": Operation cannot be fulfilled on cephblockpools.ceph.rook.io "replicapoolretained": the object has been modified; please apply your changes to the latest version and try again
2020-03-05 23:39:37.255105 E | ceph-block-pool-controller: failed to reconcile failed to delete pool "replicapoolretained". : failed to delete pool "replicapoolretained": failed to get pool "replicapoolretained" details: failed to get pool replicapoolretained details. Error ENOENT: unrecognized pool 'replicapoolretained'
: exit status 2
```

**Expected behavior:**
Pool finalizers should be removed when the CR is deleted and integration tests should pass consistently.

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
<!-- Please let us know any circumstances for reproduction of your bug. -->
Run the master integration tests and likely at least one of the K8s versions will hit the issue.
title: Pools failing to delete periodically in integration tests
